skill.name: commander.behaviors.MoveTo
skill.description: For a company commander, to know how to move and reach a destination, by issuing orders to subordinates.

parameter.name: subordinates
parameter.description: The subodinate agents to be ordered to move to.

parameter.name: waypoints
parameter.description: The waypoints to be reached by subordinates units.

feedback.name: orderIssued
feedback.description: Sent each time a mission order has been sent to a subordinate.

argument.name: subordinate
argument.description: The subordinate that has been ordered to move.

feedback.name: orderNotIssued
feedback.description: Sent if a subordinate cannot perform the "move to" mission.

argument.name: subordinate
argument.description: The subordinate that cannot perform the "moveTo" mission.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when the commander has finished to sent the "moveTo" orders, even if one or several subordinates cannot perform the mission.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the list of issued subordinates is empty.
